availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin R. Smith (Marion County, Kentucky, carpenter)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of Ambrose Smith. Married to Eliza Smith. Carpenter in Marion County in 1860 and 1870.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1, p. 531.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, St. Mary's, p. 3.
Find A Grave, "Ben R. Smith (July 29, 1838-Aptil 8, 1901)," Memorial #6079027, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6079027 (accessed February 1, 2019).
